reviewText: There have been several accounts of the Scopes "Monkey" Trial of 1925 on video and DVD. This one is an excellent overview of the case. The only disappointing aspect, and this is true of nearly every account of the case in these formats, is the near absence of any reference to the other attorneys in the case, aside from Darrow and Bryan. Neal, Malone, Hays for the defense, the prosecution team--even Judge Raulston receives scant mention.
